name: Bad Sheep Polo Club
description: The Badsheep Polo club is a creation of the breakaway Badsheep and Bad Pussy.The Badsheep Polo club is a club for the Polo Playing bunch of dudes called The Badsheep.  The players are Benthead, Sheepdog, Bad Pussy and Bonkers. Bad Pussy is their playing coach and manages the Badsheep with a vision to be Baadest Polo players in the Polo Universe. The Badsheep Polo club is open to all who want to live a life of a Polo playing God.
